price: Idite ti i brat tvoj, s dokazima Mojim, i neka sam vam Ja uvijek na pameti.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
